title: Short-Intensive: Visual Communication Design Practical Masterclass

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic design tools (Photoshop/Illustrator) and understanding of visual element composition principles
context.additional_context: Course for job seekers targeting immediate applicability improvement through portfolio creation and practical project simulation

learning_goals: Learners can explain core principles of communication design (color theory, typography, layout) with over 80% accuracy through 15-minute microlearning content provided in a mobile environment.
After three or more online feedback sessions in a blended learning environment, learners can produce customized visual communication materials for specific targets applied to real customer scenarios.
Through 1:1 design coaching and two offline workshops, learners can complete three types of responsive design solutions (web/mobile/print) directly applicable to their personal portfolios.

resources: Mobile-Optimized Design Tool: Figma Mirroring Account
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
